ETYMOLOGY: From addition (n.) + -al (adj. suffix). Addition comes from Latin additio (n. of action from addere 'to add').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Existing or happening in addition to something else; extra or supplementary.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 额外的；附加的；进一步的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Please provide any additional information that might be helpful.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 请提供任何可能有用的额外信息。
